name: Chinese Portable Media Player Video
summary: Learn about .MP5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In an attempt to set themselves apart from other media players, many Chinese portable media players advertise themselves as "MP5 players." However, there is no real MP5 file format. The MP5 files these media players use are simply renamed MP4 files. Most MP5 files are encoded using the H.264/AVC, or MPEG-4, codec. Thus, if you change the files' extension to .mp4, you can often play them in any MP4 media player.

instructions: MP5 files can directly be played on Chinese portable media players like Baidu Player. But easiest way is to change their extension to .mp4 and play on any MP4 media player e.g. VideoLAN VLC media player.

You can play MP5 videos as-is in some Chinese media players, such as Baidu Player and QvodPlayer. However, the easiest way to play an MP5 file is likely to change its extension to .mp4 and play it an MP4 media player, such as VideoLAN VLC media player.
MP5 is already an MP4 file, just change the extension of MP5 to MP4 and play it in your MP4 media player.
